name: RoboBuoy
description:
CONTROLS:

Mousewheel - Move claw left and ride.

hold left mouse - Lower claw

Hi! This game was made in 5 days. Originally I wanted to only spend the weekend, but well it didn´t work as planned. It was a nice training though and am happy to share it with you all. 

I recorded my process on youtube. It´s german though. So be warned. XD

(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClFIodpwTNZW32XLJMhlCOg)

It has a lot bugs. So be warned to that too. I want to move on to a new project.

I would like to hear some feedback.  Till then, good bye!
